title: 服务器崩溃测出是bc管道1.12.2服。但是不知道是什么原因在此问问大佬
author: qq1446546348
txt_content:
Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: 
RedstoneFlux has detected that the following OLD API classes from CoFHLib are being repacked!
    cofh.api.energy.ItemEnergyContainer, loaded from: %5BBC建筑%5Dbuildcraft-7.1.23.jar
    cofh.api.energy.EnergyStorage, loaded from: %5BBC建筑%5Dbuildcraft-7.1.23.jar
    cofh.api.energy.TileEnergyHandler, loaded from: %5BBC建筑%5Dbuildcraft-7.1.23.jar
    cofh.api.energy.IEnergyConnection, loaded from: %5BBC建筑%5Dbuildcraft-7.1.23.jar
    cofh.api.energy.IEnergyProvider, loaded from: %5BBC建筑%5Dbuildcraft-7.1.23.jar
    cofh.api.energy.IEnergyHandler, loaded from: %5BBC建筑%5Dbuildcraft-7.1.23.jar
    cofh.api.energy.IEnergyStorage, loaded from: %5BBC建筑%5Dbuildcraft-7.1.23.jar
    cofh.api.energy.IEnergyContainerItem, loaded from: %5BBC建筑%5Dbuildcraft-7.1.23.jar
    cofh.api.energy.IEnergyReceiver, loaded from: %5BBC建筑%5Dbuildcraft-7.1.23.jar
海绵端这个就是崩溃报告还有个AE2安不上去找不到报告求解这个是因为什么

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
这串英文不是说的很清楚吗
RedstoneFlux has detected that the following OLD API classes from CoFHLib are being repacked!

也就是 RedstoneFlux 检测到 buildcraft 中包含一个老版本的 CoFHLib api ，更新 buildcraft，或者也许可以删掉 mod 中的 cofh 文件夹解决

replies.author: qq1446546348
replies.txt_content: 就是想知道下这类是什么问题。虽然找到了但是我得学习
